adjectives.description: intolerant (comparative more intolerant, superlative most intolerant)

entries.meaning: Unable or indisposed to tolerate, endure or bear.
examples: I am lactose-intolerant, so I can't drink milk.

entries.meaning: Not tolerant; close-minded about new or different ideas; indisposed to tolerate contrary opinions or beliefs; impatient of dissent or opposition; denying or refusing the right of private opinion or choice in others; inclined to persecute or suppress dissent.
One who is intolerant; a bigot.
